channel.title: Pages on kasreti's crib
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on kasreti's crib

item.title: about
item.description: Welcome to kasreti’s crib! This is basically where I’ll put any long ramblings I have – but what should you expect here? Linguistics and conlangs I do reading on my own about linguistics quite often, so I’ll put any new discoveries that I find cool here and share them. I’ll try to put more explainer notes around to clarify some terminology since 90% of the people reading this blog will have zero clue about linguistics.
